fields.name: Buddy
fields.description: Buddy is a friendly 3-year-old Golden Retriever who loves playing fetch and swimming. He's great with kids and other dogs. House-trained and knows basic commands. Looking for an active family who can give him the attention he deserves.

fields.name: Whiskers
fields.description: Whiskers is a calm and gentle Persian cat who loves to cuddle. She's 2 years old and has been spayed. Perfect for a quiet household looking for a loving companion. She gets along well with other cats.

fields.name: Charlie
fields.description: Charlie is an energetic 1-year-old Labrador mix who needs an active family. He's still learning commands but is very eager to please. Great with children and loves outdoor activities. Fully vaccinated and microchipped.

fields.name: Luna
fields.description: Luna is a playful 6-month-old tabby kitten with beautiful orange and white markings. She's very social and loves attention. Would do well in a home with other cats or as an only pet. Litter trained and has all her shots.

fields.name: Rocky
fields.description: Rocky is a loyal 4-year-old German Shepherd mix looking for his forever home. He's protective but gentle, great with older children. Needs an experienced owner who can provide consistent training and exercise. House-trained and well-behaved on walks.

fields.name: Mittens
fields.description: Mittens is a sweet 3-year-old domestic shorthair with distinctive white paws that give her name. She's independent but affectionate, perfect for someone who wants a loving but low-maintenance companion. Good with other cats.
